column1: #SHEETINFO | name=Time and clock calculations

column3:
Relationships between time units:
* 1 min = 60 s
* 1 quarter = 15 min
* half an hour = 30 min = 2 quarters
* 1 hour = 60 min = 4 quarters = 3600 s
* 1 day = 24 hours

How many hours and minutes pass from 14:56 to 17:24
column2:
From 14:56 to 17:00, 2 h 4 min pass.
From 17:00 to 17:24, 24 min pass.

Total: 2 h 4 min + 24 min = 2 h 28 min.

column1: ="Calculate how many minutes pass from "&TEXT(Q38;"HH:MM")&" to "&TEXT(R38;"HH:MM")&""
="Calculate how many minutes pass from "&TEXT(Q39;"HH:MM")&" to "&TEXT(R39;"HH:MM")&""
="Calculate how many minutes pass from "&TEXT(Q40;"HH:MM")&" to "&TEXT(R40;"HH:MM")&""

A show lasting 115 minutes started at 19:20. 

What time did it end?
column2:
Converting minutes to hours and minutes: 
115 minutes is 1 hour 55 minutes (since 60 minutes is 1 hour, and we are left with 55 minutes).

Adding to the start time: 19:20 + 1:55 = 21:15

Answer: The show ended at 21:15.

column1: A bus left the city at 13:15 and traveled for 2 hours and 45 minutes. What time did it arrive at the destination?
Alice was shopping for 1 hour and 45 minutes. She started at 10:20. What time did she finish?
The watch shows 10:25. How many minutes until 11:00?
A cake baked for 1 hour and 20 minutes. What time should it be taken out of the oven if it was put in at 15:10?
A train left at 9:40 and traveled for 2 hours and 50 minutes. What time did it arrive?

Calculate how much time passes:

from 5:05 on Wednesday to 21:00 on Sunday
column2:
To make calculations easier, we can divide this period into smaller parts:
* Wednesday: from 5:05 to 24:00 (18:55 hours)
* Thursday, Friday, Saturday: 24 hours each (72 hours total)
* Sunday: from 0:00 to 21:00 (21 hours)

Total: 18:55 + 72 + 21 = 111 hours 55 minutes.

column1:
Calculate how much time passes:

from 12:30 on Monday to 15:40 on Tuesday
column2:
We are crossing the boundary between two days:
* Monday: from 12:30 to 24:00 (11 hours 30 minutes)
* Tuesday: from 0:00 to 15:40 (15 hours 40 minutes)

Total: 11 hours 30 minutes + 15 hours 40 minutes = 27 hours 10 minutes.

column1:
Calculate how much time passes:

from 17:34 on Wednesday to 21:35 on Saturday
column2:
We divide the period into smaller parts:
* Wednesday: from 17:34 to 24:00 (6 hours 26 minutes)
* Thursday, Friday: 24 hours + 24 hours 
* Saturday: from 0:00 to 21:35 (21 hours 35 minutes)

Total: 6 hours 26 minutes + 24 hours + 24 hours + 21 hours 35 minutes 
= 75 hours 61 minutes
= 76 hours 1 minute
